name: Haircut and Style
description: Get a fresh new haircut and a stylish hairdo by our expert hairstylists. We'll help you achieve the perfect look that suits your personality and preferences.

name: Deluxe Facial
description: Indulge in a luxurious facial treatment that includes deep cleansing, exfoliation, and a relaxing face massage. Our estheticians will customize the treatment to your skin type for a glowing complexion.

name: Manicure and Pedicure
description: Treat your hands and feet to a pampering session with our professional manicure and pedicure services. We'll shape your nails, take care of cuticles, and apply a beautiful polish of your choice.

name: Eyebrow Threading
description: Achieve perfectly shaped eyebrows with our gentle threading technique. Our experts will shape and define your brows to enhance your natural features.

name: Makeup Application
description: Let our professional makeup artists enhance your beauty with a flawless makeup application. Whether it's for a special occasion or a night out, we'll create the look you desire.

name: Swedish Massage
description: Relax and unwind with a rejuvenating Swedish massage. Our skilled massage therapists will use long, gliding strokes to ease tension and promote relaxation.

name: Bridal Hair and Makeup
description: For your special day, our salon offers complete bridal hair and makeup services. Our talented team will create a stunning look that will make you feel like a princess.

name: Root Touch-Up
description: Keep your hair color looking vibrant and fresh with a root touch-up. Our color specialists will match your existing shade to cover any regrowth and maintain a seamless look.

name: Anti-Aging Facial
description: Reverse the signs of aging with our targeted anti-aging facial treatment. We'll use specialized products and techniques to reduce fine lines, wrinkles, and improve skin elasticity.

name: Gel Nail Extensions
description: Get long-lasting and durable nail extensions with our gel nail service. We'll create beautiful and natural-looking extensions that won't chip or peel.
